item.title: About
item.description: I’m Philip, aka melo, and I do a little coding. This blog’s purpose is to host any disclosures and/or security research conducted by me, or other stuff that I feel worthy of sharing with the world. I’m currently working as a Content Engineer at Hack The Box. You can also find me here: HackTheBox: https://app.hackthebox.com/profile/458049 GitHub: https://github.com/CrzPhil LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/philipgiavridis Twitter: https://twitter.com/enigmelo Contact I occasionally check this inbox: enigmelo86@gmail.com PGP Key
